verses.verse: And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn <S%H4729><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on: of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> it.

A cubit <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof; foursquare <S%H7251><s%> shall it be: and two cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof: the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof shall be of the same.

And you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> the top <S%H1406><s%> thereof, and the sides <S%H7023><s%> thereof round <S%H5439><s%> about, and the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof; and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> to it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about.

And two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> to it under <S%H8478><s%> the crown <S%H2213><s%> of it, by the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H6763><s%> thereof, on the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6654><s%> of it shall you make <S%H6213><s%> it; and they shall be for places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it with. <S%H1992><s%>
And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> that is by the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat that is over <S%H5921><s%> the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> every morning: <S%H1242><s%> when he dresses <S%H3190><s%> the lamps, <S%H5216><s%> he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> incense on it.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> lights <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even, <S%H6153><s%> he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> on it, a perpetual <S%H8548><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

You shall offer <S%H5927><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> nor burnt <S%H5930><s%> sacrifice, nor meat offering; <S%H4503><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you pour <S%H5258><s%> drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereon. <S%H5921><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it once <S%H259><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering of atonements: <S%H3725><s%> once <S%H259><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall he make atonement <S%H3722><s%> on it throughout your generations: <S%H1755><s%> it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> you take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> after their number, <S%H6485><s%> then shall they give <S%H5414><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%> for his soul <S%H5315><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when you number <S%H6485><s%> them; that there be no <S%H3808><s%> plague <S%H5063><s%> among them, when you number <S%H6485><s%> them.

This <S%H2088><s%> they shall give, <S%H5414><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that passes <S%H5674><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> them that are numbered, <S%H6485><s%> half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%> (a shekel <S%H8255><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs: <S%H1626><s%>) an half <S%H4276><s%> shekel <S%H8255><s%> shall be the offering <S%H8641><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> one that passes <S%H5674><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> them that are numbered, <S%H6485><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and above, <S%H4605><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The rich <S%H6223><s%> shall not give more, <S%H7235><s%> and the poor <S%H1800><s%> shall not give less <S%H4591><s%> than half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel, <S%H8255><s%> when they give <S%H5414><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls. <S%H5315><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the atonement <S%H3725><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> it for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation; <S%H4150><s%> that it may be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls. <S%H5315><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

You shall also make <S%H6213><s%> a laver <S%H3595><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%> also of brass, <S%H5178><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> with: and you shall put <S%H5414><s%> it between <S%H996><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and you shall put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therein. <S%H8033><s%>
For Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall wash <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%> thereat:

When they go <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> with water, <S%H4325><s%> that they die <S%H4191><s%> not; or <S%H176><s%> when they come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> to minister, <S%H8334><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> offering made by fire to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

So they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet, <S%H7272><s%> that they die <S%H4191><s%> not: and it shall be a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> to them, even to him and to his seed <S%H2233><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>
Moreover the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> you also to you principal <S%H7218><s%> spices, <S%H1314><s%> of pure <S%H1865><s%> myrrh <S%H4753><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels, and of sweet <S%H1314><s%> cinnamon <S%H7076><s%> half <S%H4276><s%> so much, <S%H4276><s%> even two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels, and of sweet <S%H1314><s%> calamus <S%H7070><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels,

And of cassia <S%H6916><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> an hin: <S%H1969><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it an oil <S%H8081><s%> of holy <S%H6944><s%> ointment, <S%H4888><s%> an ointment <S%H4888><s%> compound <S%H4842><s%> after the are <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary: <S%H7543><s%> it shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>
And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> therewith, and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%>
And the table <S%H7979><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> and his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense, <S%H7004><s%>
And the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering with all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot. <S%H3653><s%>
And you shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them, that they may be most <S%H6944><s%> holy: <S%H6944><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> them shall be holy. <S%H6942><s%>
And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> them, that they may minister to me in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> to me throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

On man's <S%H120><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall it not be poured, <S%H3251><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> any other like <S%H3644><s%> it, after the composition <S%H4971><s%> of it: it is holy, <S%H6944><s%> and it shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to you.

Whoever <S%H376><s%> compounds <S%H7543><s%> any like <S%H3644><s%> it, or whoever <S%H834><s%> puts <S%H5414><s%> any of it on a stranger, <S%H2114><s%> shall even be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> to you sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices, <S%H5561><s%> stacte, <S%H5198><s%> and onycha, <S%H7827><s%> and galbanum; <S%H2464><s%> these sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H5561><s%> with pure <S%H2134><s%> frankincense: <S%H3828><s%> of each <S%H905><s%> shall there be a like weight:

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it a perfume, <S%H7004><s%> a confection <S%H7545><s%> after the are <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary, <S%H7543><s%> tempered <S%H4414><s%> together, pure <S%H2889><s%> and holy: <S%H6944><s%>

And you shall beat <S%H7833><s%> some of it very <S%H1854><s%> small, <S%H1854><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> of it before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you: it shall be to you most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And as for the perfume <S%H7004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall make, <S%H6213><s%> you shall not make <S%H6213><s%> to yourselves according to the composition <S%H4971><s%> thereof: it shall be to you holy <S%H6944><s%> for the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Whoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> to that, to smell <S%H7306><s%> thereto, shall even be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people. <S%H5971><s%>
